Implement a 3x3 Tic Tac Toe core in src/game with pure logic.

Requirements:
- Human vs AI
- Randomly assign who starts at reset
- Provide:
  - playMove(index)
  - reset()
  - getBoard()
  - currentPlayer()
  - checkWinner() with winning line indices
  - isDraw()
- No DOM usage
- Validate with pnpm type-check and pnpm lint
